oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Maynard. Horace Maynard (1814-1882).
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Smiley's Photograph Gallery, Gay Street, Knoxville, TN
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Carte-de-visite (CDV) of Horace Maynard (1814-1882), a lawyer in East Tennessee. He was a member of the 35th-37th Congress of the United State (1857-1863), and also served as Tennessee State Attorney General under Andrew Johnson, as U.S. Minister to Turkey, and as Postmaster General under President Rutherford B. Hayes.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Portraits; Cartes de visite; Politicians; Lawyers;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: To use photographs or to order reproductions, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8808. Please refer to Image Number and provide a brief description of the photograph.
